snippet: Bana and her mother, Fatemah, reported on Twitter that they had arrived Monday in an opposition-held area in the countryside of western Aleppo Province....
lead_paragraph: Bana and her mother, Fatemah, reported on Twitter that they had arrived Monday in an opposition-held area in the countryside of western Aleppo Province.

headline.main: Bana al-Abed, Child Who Became Aleppo’s Civilian Face, Is Evacuated
